talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>You've come to dig up adventure
too, huh?
talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Unconscious_00>I told ya.<sp:5:0:0> If you wanna<sp:5:0:0> use the mine cart,
<sp:5:0:0>it's all yours.<sp:5:0:0> Just take it, <sp:5:0:0>man.

But <sp:5:0:0>this mine cart <sp:5:0:0>only goes <sp:5:0:0>to the <clr:0000>summit<clr:ffff>
<sp:5:0:0>of <clr:0000>Death Mountain<clr:ffff>,<sp:5:0:0> you know.<sp:5:0:0>
talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>See those boulders over there? It'll be a
minute before they're done. You can't
rush adventure digging.
talk_04:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0000>Just between you and me, I've heard tell of an
ancient Goron dwelling not far from here.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Death Mountain is all about adventure!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Unconscious_01>Can't you see <sp:5:0:0>I'm busy here?<sp:5:0:0> My mouth
<sp:5:0:0>'n' me<sp:5:0:0> are kinda<sp:5:0:0> occupied.<sp:5:0:0>

If you wanna<sp:5:0:0> use the mine cart, knock
yourself <sp:5:0:0>out.

But <sp:5:0:0>this mine cart <sp:5:0:0>only goes <sp:5:0:0>to the <clr:0000>summit<clr:ffff>
<sp:5:0:0>of <clr:0000>Death Mountain<clr:ffff>,<sp:5:0:0> you know.<sp:5:0:0>
